<script setup>
import { ref, computed } from 'vue';
import { Disclosure } from '@headlessui/vue';
import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/vue-fontawesome';
import BellIcon from '@heroicons/vue/20/solid/BellIcon';
import { faBars, faSearch } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';

const query = ref('');
const isSidebarOpen = ref(false);
const isSidebarCollapsed = ref(false);
const showDropdown = ref(false);
const showProfileDropdown = ref(false);

const toggleSidebar = () => {
  isSidebarOpen.value = !isSidebarOpen.value;
};

const toggleDropdown = (type, index) => {
  // Example logic to handle dropdowns
};

const toggleProfileDropdown = () => {
  showProfileDropdown.value = !showProfileDropdown.value;
};

// Example data for menu items
const menuData = {
  apps: [
    { name: 'Dashboard', icon: 'fa-tachometer-alt', children: [] },
    { name: 'Users', icon: 'fa-users', children: [] },
    { name: 'Settings', icon: 'fa-cogs', children: [{ name: 'General', icon: 'fa-cogs' }, { name: 'Security', icon: 'fa-lock' }] }
  ],
  ui: [
    { name: 'Buttons', icon: 'fa-hand-pointer', children: [] },
    { name: 'Forms', icon: 'fa-file-signature', children: [] },
    { name: 'Tables', icon: 'fa-table', children: [] }
  ]
};

const handleMouseEnter = (item) => {
  item.showChildren = true;
};

const handleMouseLeave = (item) => {
  item.showChildren = false;
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.sidebar {
  transition: width 0.3s ease;
}
.sidebar-collapsed {
  display: none;
}
.dropdown-menu {
  display: none;
}
.dropdown-menu.show {
  display: block;
}
</style>
